statements: UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = 0.02 WHERE account_id = 1001;
UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = 0.015 WHERE account_id = 2005;
UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = 0.03 WHERE account_id = 3007;
UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = interest_rate * 1.1 WHERE account_id = 123;
UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = CASE WHEN account_id = 456 THEN interest_rate * 1.2 ELSE interest_rate END;
UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = interest_rate + 0.25 WHERE account_id IN (789, 101112);
UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = 0.03 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE SavingsAccount SET balance = 1500.00 WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE SavingsAccount SET accrued_interest = 25.50 WHERE account_id = 98765;
UPDATE Interest SET interest_rate = 3.5 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE SavingsAccount SET balance = balance + 1000, accrued_interest = accrued_interest * 1.02 WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE SavingsAccount sa JOIN Interest i ON sa.account_id = i.account_id SET sa.accrued_interest = sa.accrued_interest + i.interest_rate * sa.balance WHERE sa.account_id = 98765;
UPDATE Savings_Accounts SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE Interest_Accrual SET accrued_interest = accrued_interest + 10 WHERE accrual_id = 1;
UPDATE Interest_Rates SET interest_rate = 3.5 WHERE interest_id = 1;

UPDATE Transaction SET transaction_amount = 50.25 WHERE transaction_id = 456;

UPDATE SavingsAccount SET balance = 1500.00 WHERE account_id = '54321-09876-54321-09876-54321'
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = '98765-43210-98765-43210-98765'
